import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Typography, TextField, Button} from '@material-ui/core' import { useTheme } from '@material-ui/core/styles' export default function ContactForm(){ const [contactInfo, setContactInfo] = useState({}); const theme = useTheme(); const handleFieldChange = (e) => { let tempInfo = contactInfo; tempInfo[e.target.name] = e.target.value; setContactInfo(tempInfo); } return (
Contact Form
) }
